name: multitasking
content:
multitasking noun [U]
(PERSON/PRODUCT)
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person's or product's ability to do more than one thing at a time: To succeed, you will need strong multitasking skills. The lotion is a multitasking formula that offers a natural-looking sunless tan while protecting skin from the damaging effects of the sun.

multitasking noun [U]
(COMPUTER)
the ability of a computer to operate several programs at one time: The machine allows multitasking without the need to buy extra hardware.

Related word
multitask
Add to word list
Add to word list
the ability to do several different jobs at the same time: Women are supposed to be more adept at multitasking and communicating. multitasking skills
IT a computing process that allows a computer to operate several different programs at the same time: a multitasking operating system
